the scenarios for BECCS have become much more realistic
, though concerns regarding impacts on food
and the environment remain, while the reliability of models is uncertain due to methodological
Improvements to models are required to better capture wider environmental and social impacts
of BECCS in order to ascertain its sustainable contribution
opportunity for other options that could negate very large
scale deployment of BECCS, such as other
